name: BeReady
slogan: Free, accredited skills and well-being training for students
description: We offer online and offline training resources to schools across the UK.

jobs.title: Schools Partnership Executive
jobs.description:
School Partnerships Executive

About BeReady:
BeReady is an ed-tech start-up based in central London. We were established in order to develop the employability and 'soft skills' of school age students and university graduates to aid their transition into the workplace. We create free, accredited online training which enables students to develop their skills whenever they wish, wherever they may be. To find out more about our work, please visit www.bereadygroup.org.

The role will be based in our Marble Arch office.

The Role:
We are looking for an energetic and ambitious School Partnerships Executive to join our fast-growing start up!

The successful applicant will be working to manage school partners and to ensure they’re getting the most out of our free resources. You will work to on-board partners, train staff and oversee the launch of our resources within your schools. You will also be organising events and campaigns for our employer partners.

Daily Tasks:
You will be the day-to-day point of contact for your schools, ensuring they receive the best service possible and maximise our suite of resources

Booking training events with partner schools and encouraging face-to-face interactions with partner schools

Accessing local school networks and presenting our work to key stakeholders

Meeting engagement targets

Ensuring your schools are using our resources effectively

Skills Required:
Confident communicator who is able to network effectively over the phone and in person

Ability to build and sustain relationships with partners
Strong presentation skills

Positive attitude and the resilience to work in a start-up environment

Experience using CRM

Previous experience in recruitment or sales a bonus

Salary:
£24,000 per year.

How to apply:
Please send us a cover letter outlining why you would be suitable for this role alongside your CV.

Any applications sent without a cover letter will not be considered.

Start Date:
ASAP
